parameters.name: BackendName
parameters.description: The name of the backend service.

parameters.name: BackendType
parameters.description: The type of the backend service.

parameters.name: CreateEventBridgeServiceLinkedRole
parameters.description: Specifies to create a EventBridge service-linked role.

parameters.name: CreateSlr
parameters.description: Specifies to create a service-linked role.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag of objects that match the rule. You can specify multiple tags.
